name: Infierno Azul
overview: Arcade in which you must pilot the "Blue Hellfire" chopper. - It consists of three different stages: - In the first stage, you must defend your base against the enemy fighters. - In the second stage, you must lead the counterattack against fighters and high tech ballons. - In the third stage, you must destroy the ultimate enemy menace, a high tech cruiser with heavy attack power.
